website_summaries.verdict: This hair dryer features an impressive design and a sturdy build, although there are competitors that are lighter and more powerful.
pros: Features a salon-worthy design with a contoured handle that cuts down on hand fatigue with extended use
Built-in ion generator produces even heat without damaging hair
Works well for fine, straight hair
cons: Somewhat heavy and loud, yet it's a bit under-powered for a dryer in its price range

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of very fine hair and I bought this hoping it would help with frizz and volume. I found even with low heat and the ion setting on, it was no different than any other hair dryer you'd find at Target and hardly worth $170. I tried it a few times with different settings and products and there was still little to no difference at all. I have contacted 6th Sense to initiate a return and refund.
customer_reviews.author: Liza

customer_reviews.title: I can style my hair with this hairdryer so easily. I use it with the ions off to ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about buying an expensive hair dryer, but I have to say the quality is remarkable. I have long, thick, wavy hair and I am done in 10 minutes. I can style my hair with this hairdryer so easily. I use it with the ions off to create volume underneath and then finish off with the ions on for a nice smooth finish. I love this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased the 6th Sense Styling Masterpiece Pro Ionic Hair Dryer and WOW!!! It is everything it says. My hair is very damaged due to hair coming in wiry gray, thinning, colored, years of flat iron use. I am 55 years old and I have never found a product that has made my air look so soft and shiny after blow drying. I love the fact that is is very light weight as well. I am totally impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic hair dryer.  Light, powerful, and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: Great hair dryer. I purchased this for my girlfriend who has intense shoulder pain. I was looking for a very lightweight hairdryer that incorporated the new(ish) technology with a cool shot button, ionic drying, and powerful. This fit the bill perfectly. She loves it. I tried it and have to say it works exceptionally well. I purchased the Jinri Salon Grade Professional Hair Dryer 1875W AC Motor Negative Ionic Ceramic from Amazon as well and while I like it I have to admit the Jinri is substantially heavier than this one.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: OMG! First blow out and I’m in love! I have wirey gray hair and now blonde added to my hair. I’m really a dark brunette. Anyways, I lost the nozzle to my Babliss ceramic pro hair dryer and I wanted to get a REALLY good hair dryer so I read tons of reviews. I really was skeptical about the this blow dryer and it is expensive. One blowout and my hair does not even need to be straightened I am absolutely in love and I hope that this blow dryer last forever. I absolutely love it. It was worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: LK

customer_reviews.title: I’ve had this hairdryer for 2 years and still love it. I’m a professional hairdresser and needed something ...
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this hairdryer for 2 years and still love it. I’m a professional hairdresser and needed something small, effective and lightweight and this delivers! I love that it’s seethru so I can know if something is going on inside (no mystery rattles or caught hair burning). I replaced the vent mesh with a more dense one too catch hair and it works much better than the one provided. Be sure to clean it often!!! This little blow dryer weighs less than my round brushes and has saved my wrist and shoulder from so much fatigue.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ella

customer_reviews.title: Stunning and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recently got the Masterpiece Pro and this is what she had to say: "First off, I really love the packaging! Presentation is everything, and this did not disappoint! And I love the unique translucent blue color of my new hair dryer. But most importantly, it's a great product! It's light and doesn't sound obnoxious when using it. It has two temperatures and speeds depending on how fast you need your hair to dry. The concentrator nozzles are a great feature to use with a hair brush and to target a specific area of my hair at a time. And I love the way my hair looks after I use it!”
customer_reviews.author: Kirk Mossing, President, The Hired Gunz

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long, terrible city we services
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t last long and costumer services is terrible ! The first I bought lasted a bit less than a year and I tried to make the warranty work they absolutely did not follow up with my request as if the person I was talking to just disappeared. The second one I bought just burned off, I’m a professional hairstylist I love the light weight of this dryer but the last one last only 8 months, furthermore they put a very specific screw so you can’t easily désassemble it to clean it up from stuck hair . My dryer doesn’t work anymore I’m really disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth the price
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent dryer. I was surprised at how light it was immediately upon unboxing it. It comes with a velvet dust bag. I have course, thick, bleached blonde hair and this thing gets me smooth and even shiny! The ion setting gets hair super smooth. Prior to having this dryer, my hair only looked this good when I left the salon. I’ve only had it two weeks, so can’t say anything about it’s longevity, but it’s a great product so far. I recommend this for thick and/or course hair.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Sharkey

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing blow dryer. A lot of force but not too hot. It’s light weight and not loud. Super cute too as a conversation starter for professionals. I use this blow dryer all day and it’s amazing. I think it’s way better than the Dyson. I had another one that I used for 3 and a half years. Bought a second recently with the diffuser attachement. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sib G

customer_reviews.title: replacing a dead Dyson...
customer_reviews.text: Im a professional stylist. I wanted short, powerful, quiet, light tool. read enough reviews to give it a try. I am VERY impressed! use it on high with ion ON all the time. What I noticed most was SHINE! and I deliberately did not use shine blow dry products so I could see the difference. I recommend this to anyone and everyone! I did buy the protection plan because i use it at the salon.
customer_reviews.author: Judi R.

customer_reviews.title: In the end, it just wasn't worth the price
customer_reviews.text: I found this dryer to work just fine. It is small and light, two things I was looking for. But, in the end, I just could not justify the price. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Deb Amorelli

customer_reviews.title: My new favorite hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: When I saw the reviews for this hairdryer I was skeptical but intrigued. They seemed too good to be true. I've been using it for a few weeks now, including in hot and humid weather. I'm really impressed. It drastically reduces frizz, flyaways, etc. My hair has been much more manageable. I keep the ionic setting on all the time. It is also incredibly lightweight. The placement of the buttons takes some getting used to but otherwise this is the best hairdryer I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa A Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Best hairdryer I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best hair dryer I have ever used. And I have tried dozens over the years! It is light-weight, has a very long cord, dries hair very fast. I love the ionic option, and use it all the time to tame frizz. I have very thick hair and this really saves me time, with a great result.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. A

customer_reviews.title: Good dryer, but not as light or powerful as I had exp.
customer_reviews.text: I wanted quiet and small and light weight. This is small, but opening for hair flow is too small...most hair dryers have very open blower area; whereas this one is very narrow. And , even though light weight, not as light as I had hoped ( or as light as my previous dryer which is also quiet, small, ionic, light, and has much wider area for blowing air).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... barber and cosmetologist professional for over 12 years highly recommend this blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Master barber and cosmetologist professional for over 12 years highly recommend this blow dryer! it’s lasted me over two years with daily use and just now sounds like I need to get a new one (still works great) completely impressed I’m buying two brand new blow dryer’s to use on a daily basis
customer_reviews.author: thomas

customer_reviews.title: Phenomenal customer service
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to update my review. Great customer service! After writing this review the company contacted me and immediately sent me a replacement dryer. Can’t say enough good things about them and the dryer. I loved this dryer until it stopped working while under warranty. I have tried to contact this company. Every phone number and email address on their web site is incorrect. If anyone can give me the correct info it would be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: karin winslow

customer_reviews.title: Awesome lightweight compact powerhouse hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: At first glance this looks like a child’s toy. It’s compact and lightweight, but it’s an amazing hair dryer. I had been faithful to my Chi hair dryers for many years, but they were very heavy and they would constantly break so I wanted to try a different brand. I am not disappointed. I love this hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: DENISE S.

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Has adjustments for a nice warm cool and very hot When u need it. The cord is longer than most hair dryers and thicker for durability. I believe it was well worth what I paid for it. (I still cannot get the tip back off tho)
customer_reviews.author: Brownie

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE of the nozzles getting severely hot!!!
customer_reviews.text: Product doesn’t blow much power. But the main thing is please beware of the nozzle. It get severely hot while drying. I burnt my hand on it when trying to change it. They should not get that hot to have around your face and head and such.
customer_reviews.author: Vicki Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: This Hair Dryer is the bomb! it is small but powerful and drys my wife's hair super fast. I am a hero. It's worth the money. Cheers, Mark from SLC
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For beautiful silky hair
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this blow dryer makes my hair feel and look silky again. I have a lot of fine hair. My hair was getting damaged so I changed blow dryers. This one worked! And it’s light weight. Great customer service too! Thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Esther L Hogan

customer_reviews.title: Works good... for a short time
customer_reviews.text: I got this less than 6 months ago and the on/off switch quit working. Not ok when it costs this much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: got hot and smoked,  then quit... for the price,  it should have lasted much longer!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this blow dryer and it lasted a little over 2 years..I was right I the middle of drying my hair, it started smoking and quit, it's not clogged with hair. It just got hot and quit..I would normally not complain but as much as this blow dryer cost, it should have lasted much longer!
customer_reviews.author: TRACIE OLIVER

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.text: It is very light weight and love the off and on ionic control. The cord could have been more light weight though.
customer_reviews.author: bernermom

customer_reviews.title: Awesome dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful, light weight dryer. Quiet, and easy to handle. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight and High heat If you are looking for professional hair dryer buy this one
customer_reviews.author: Mida Hussein

customer_reviews.title: Smooth blow out
customer_reviews.text: I’m a stylist of 10 years. Using this multiple times a day 6 days a week. No issues and it’s been 5-6 months. Dries the hair with a round brush even smoother than my chi. Only downside is it doesn’t come with a diffuser for curly hair.
customer_reviews.author: L. Crane

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE This Hairdryer
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day. It's small and lightweight so I can easily get to the back of my head without getting the nozzle too close to my hair and burning it. It's quiet and dries my hair fast without over-drying it. I just wish it came with a diffuser as I sometimes like to wear my hair curly.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Philipsen

customer_reviews.title: the best hairdryer ever
customer_reviews.text: the best hairdryer ever ! I mean EVER !! super light super easy to handle and fast, brings shine and volume... perfect !!! worth every penny !! By far better then the new dyson ...what to me is a waste of money and you damage your hair- it is getting burned.
customer_reviews.author: ISABEL

customer_reviews.title: Light, powerful and nice
customer_reviews.text: I love this darter because is super light and super effective
customer_reviews.author: Jil

customer_reviews.title: Great little blow dryer with lots of power!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little blow dryer! I bought the diffuser that goes with it and it was perfect for traveling!
customer_reviews.author: J. Klopatek-driscoll

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Not the best. Works just as good as a $50 blow dryer. I was pretty excited to try it too. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light and efficient
customer_reviews.text: This blowdryer dried my hair quickly and gently and beautifully. I would like a diffuser attachment with it or if it would fit my universal diffuser, but the attachments worked very well.
customer_reviews.author: Faith P. Hiatt

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: My wife and daughter loved the product. Great product and vendor. Arrived really fast and well packed.
customer_reviews.author: MELVIN

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Light weight but made very well. I love this hairdryer. I bought the lovely blue hairdryer. Cord is nice and long but a bit heavyweight.
customer_reviews.author: Littlerosie

customer_reviews.title: Use with caution
customer_reviews.text: Hair easily gets sucked into the back of blow dryer
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Imakyure

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Dryer was nicely packaged but did not dry as I expected it n left hair burnt n frizzy.
customer_reviews.author: Afaf Igbaria

customer_reviews.title: Small, Quiet, Light & Perfect Hair Dryer
customer_reviews.text: Received my Professional Ionic Hair Dryer and LOVE it. I read the reviews from others and agree with the 5 star rating. The hair dryer is small, quiet and very light; perfect for traveling. It dries my long (below shoulder) length hair quickly leaving it soft and shiny. The shape of the dryer has a built-in "stand" which allows the hair dryer to sit on the counter without taking up much space. Has a super long cord and comes with two attachments. Wish it came with a travel bag but that doesn't stop me from giving it 5 stars. A bit expensive but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper!

customer_reviews.title: so this super lightweight and powerful hairdryer has been amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have scoliosis and it hurts to hold regular hair dryers while drying my hair ,so this super lightweight and powerful hairdryer has been amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lot of blow dryers and this is up there with the best. It's everything as described. And 6th Sense Styling Technology is a great company. They believe 'the customer comes first.' I had a problem with my cord and they took care of it right away. I highly recommend this dryer
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Nelson

customer_reviews.title: If your doing blowouts you need this in your life.
customer_reviews.text: This thing in awesome 👌. All the stylist at my salon love it. Nice chunky button you know are going to last. Light weight for those blowouts and lots of heat on tap.
customer_reviews.author: zachary gatfield

customer_reviews.title: Best dryer - Best customer service
customer_reviews.text: I’ve loved this dryer since Day 1, After using it for 9 months it suddenly quit. Emailed the company, and was immediately sent a replacement. If you’re thinking it’s a lot of money for a hair dryer (I did), go for it. You won’t be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi Schwartz

customer_reviews.title: This is the best hair dryer I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: The drying power is perfect - and add the fact it is very light weight and travels easily - I couldn't be happier. When you have questions, the customer support is the very best. I highly recommend this hair dryer - the long term warranty is an additional feature.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than Expected!
customer_reviews.text: All the previous reviews were absolutely right! I was skeptical but this dryer really does make a difference in your hair --- I don't know how they do it but it works! Better texture and more volume from the very first time. Also, light weight. Pricey but worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and quick make hair beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Amazing dryer lightweight and does the job great! Gets my hair super shiny in no time. Customer service is the best I have ever seen! Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: toby robins

customer_reviews.title: 1.6 lbs of potent & precision hair styling ... worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: so lightweight and everything one needs to accomplish a professional look! The company is very customer service oriented which is a big plus in my book. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: luicyrules

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very expensive for a hair dryer, but justified by its performance
customer_reviews.author: John W

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: I love this hairdryer and the company. The amount of power that comes from it is perfect. I have thick hair, and it dries my hair super fast. I had a problem with my order and the company shipped me a new one in 3 days. They are extremely kind and fast with replies. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: It also seemed to want to rotate in my hand like it was off center
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer left my hair soft and frizz-free; however, I could not get past the fact that when I used a round brush in one hand and the dryer in the other, I kept hitting the cold-shot button by accident (which then dimmed my bedroom lights every time!). It also seemed to want to rotate in my hand like it was off center. I use a hair dryer so frequently that I could not deal with these quirks. I returned this dryer for a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love mine.
customer_reviews.text: What a little wonder this is. The ease and efficiancy of this dryer is well worth the extra money. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Pat Forehand

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Expensive, but made a noticeable difference with my hair and my husbands.
customer_reviews.author: KKE

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but since I use it at least every other day it's worth the cost.
customer_reviews.text: Great hair dryer. I get a nice blow-dry in less than 10 minutes
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: Best hair dryer I've ever had!
customer_reviews.text: I thought for so many years that I was completely useless when it came to doing my hair. Turns out I just had the wrong tools, I look like I just came out of the hair salon and I did it all by myself!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: Great hair dryer leaves your hair looking great!! I’ve gotten good compliments!
customer_reviews.author: C martinez

customer_reviews.title: Works well and fast. No damage to hair.
customer_reviews.text: Dries like a champ. Hair stays nice and shiny. A little bulky for traveling but worth taking. Best dryer ever.
customer_reviews.author: Diana Cashion

customer_reviews.title: Commitment to customer success is beyond what I have ever seen
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of buying a new hair dryer for my wife almost every year. This model was highly rated and it was obvious looking at the reviews that these were not fake ones (yes, I have seen fake reviews even for hair dryers). I am Quality Assurance manager for a software company and I was blown away by the commitment to customer success expressed on the product manual. The two-year warranty on the unit was also important to me before purchasing. My wife is happy with the dryer - she likes that it is lighter than previous models and it has a long cord as well. I am keeping my fingers crossed that this unit will last.
customer_reviews.author: Customer for Austin, TX

customer_reviews.title: Not that different from other hair dryers
customer_reviews.text: I had been led to think it would not blow the curls out of my hair, but it does.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret A. Turbyfill

customer_reviews.title: The best hair dryer I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: The best hair dryer I've ever had! Light! Beautiful! Does such a good job! Meet all my hopes of a dryer. !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little thing
customer_reviews.text: The first Dryer that I received was defective, and the seller sent me a replacement quickly with no hassle. The replacement works great! I really love the lightweight design.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay French

customer_reviews.title: however I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have only used this dryer a couple of times so far, however I am very happy with it. It is extremely powerful, fairly lightweight, and really has cut my drying time down dramatically.
customer_reviews.author: BellaAnima

customer_reviews.title: Very weak
customer_reviews.text: Very weak more like a $30 hair dryer. I should have returned it
customer_reviews.author: Roy Jones

customer_reviews.title: I like this blow dryer
customer_reviews.text: I like this blow dryer, but as a professional stylist with limited timed appointments, I just don't feel it has as much power as I'm looking for. It is incredibly light weight & would be a great back-up dryer! I think it would be awesome for someone to use at home! I'm also very disappointed that I somehow received an incomplete order. It seems the packaging was tampered with, the cord was not put away in the bottom compartment & I did not receive either of the two nozzles with this dryer as it was suppose to include. Sadly I most likely will be returning this dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Wife approved
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my wife for Christmas. She "loves" it. Delivery was quick and I think it's was a winner. I did not know that hair dryers could be that expensive but I think it was worth it. Thanks! Amazon for having something I didn't have to go drive around to find.
customer_reviews.author: Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Keep looking suspicious reviews
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed, all I can say about all the reviews is it very light. Much better hair drys out there. I have thick highlighted hair using salon products still had a head of frizz
customer_reviews.author: pitsy88

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: Amazing hair dryer. Thick and curly hair is no match for this. Light and efficient -- totally worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: This is a wonderful dryer. It is quite small but delivers the ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful dryer. It is quite small but delivers the same flow of air as much larger dryers. It is great for travel.
customer_reviews.author: L inda Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This dries my hair super duper fast, it is small and light weight. I LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Choug

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Buy
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Product....Plenty of power which allows you to dry your hair in a minimal amount of time. Does a great job of giving you volume if needed and absolutely allows you the benefit of throwing away your hair straightener by using the same feature built into this hair dryer. It is well made and lightweight. Item was well packaged and shipped out in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: I love it! Compact
customer_reviews.text: I love it! Compact, lightweight and dries my hair quickly without scorching it. Great for travel, I loaned it to my sister to use while we were on a trip together, she loved it too.
customer_reviews.author: PDX Joan

customer_reviews.title: It's light weight and has the best power cord I've ever seen and long
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say this. I have owned several proffectional blow dryers and not one of them even comes close to craftsmanship of this one. It's light weight and has the best power cord I've ever seen and long. This blow dryer dries my hair in half the time of my last Drier, the T3. I have long color treated and waivy hair. I can hardly weight for this product to become available in my local store. Oh and did I mention it comes with a two year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Lenett

customer_reviews.title: Awesome power in a small package.
customer_reviews.text: This little thing is powerful! The only part of it I don’t care for is the long cord. Otherwise it’s light weight & small and works great.
customer_reviews.author: OMS

customer_reviews.title: It driea hair super quick!
customer_reviews.text: My wife is a professional hair stylist and she loves it! It only takes half the time to dry her hair and get ready, and I love that! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. S.

customer_reviews.title: My Dyson dryer much faster and better for hair
customer_reviews.text: It is ok dryer . My Dyson dryer much faster and better for hair.
customer_reviews.author: Lina

customer_reviews.title: It dries my fast about two to three minutes. ...
customer_reviews.text: It dries my fast about two to three minutes. And I have thick Asian hair but it's not as light as I thought or some make it to be. I'm surprised how heavy the cable is honestly.
customer_reviews.author: Chandra Doss

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love, favorite hair dryer ever. Worth every penny! No more dried fried hair.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have been a stylist for 22 years and the 6th sense dryer is the most amazing dryer I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Seriously worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This hair dryer rocks! I did not need a flat iron after drying and it makes your hair feel like silk. I didnt put much product in it and it looks like i used thermal protectant. I have medium fine hair and it tends to get frizzy due to dry climate in CO. Wow i am really impressed w the ion setting on this thing. Definitely no buyers remorse here!
customer_reviews.author: Digi

customer_reviews.title: too loud and too expensive and no different than the ...
customer_reviews.text: too loud and too expensive and no different than the cheap ones I've had before I returned this item
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Tyler

customer_reviews.title: No power
customer_reviews.text: Not happy with this purchase. It was a nice compact size, but the power was just as small. No power, looked cheaply made. Very unhappy with what this was. Not worth the price at all! Felt like a drug store dryer you buy for $15. Sadly I waited to long to return it, so now I'm stuck with it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Connie

customer_reviews.title: I think it was defective but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: After speaking with customer service, I believe I may have had a defective product. I was contacted and refunded immediately with apologies. Pretty impressed The reason I initially chose this product was the high reviews on amazon and YouTube. Original post: The one I received does Not have enough power, takes hair a long time to dry, it's already giving off a burn smell after using it for 1.5 months. i put the concentrator piece on, tried to switch it out for the other piece and it won't come off! Like it's stuck for good. Just not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Boncal

customer_reviews.title: If you love your hair, don't buy this dryer!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love the size and weight of this dryer.. BUT the barrel and attachments get too hot even to touch..caused my hair to dry out making it frizz and become brittle. Seems like the dryer is cheaply made..VERY UNHAPPY WITH HOW MY HAIR TURNED OUT using the same method and same brushes I've used to blow and straighten my hair hair for years! And now my hair is in worse shape than it's ever been!!!...I would give it a negative star if I could..
customer_reviews.author: USMC~Wife~151

customer_reviews.title: seems like a scam
customer_reviews.text: Returned it. Tiny and barely blows. Not as advertised, seems like a scam.
customer_reviews.author: Izzy

customer_reviews.title: I consider myself a pretty decent blowsryer on myself but finally after an hour ...
customer_reviews.text: Update: the seller contacted me to address my feedback which I appreciate. They replaced the dryer which I haven’t tried the new one yet. I’m glad the customer service was excellent. Some of The previous reviews are probably written by the company and not real. This dryer didn’t get my curly hair smooth at all really. I consider myself a pretty decent blowsryer on myself but finally after an hour my hair looked smooth. I have excellent products that worked amazingly well with previous t3.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: LOVE, LOVE, this hair dryer!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best hair dryer I have ever owned!!!! I took this to my stylist and she has gotten her shop to buy 4 of them. Light in your hand, great for long hair, stands by itself..dries hair quickly and the cold shot feature really helps set in your style.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Bets hair dryer I have ever used.....
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair dryer I have ever used.....it is light weight and has a lot of adjustments to individualize the results. I have thick course short hair and I air dry it and finish it off with this hair dryer....then I flat iron it......I am actually getting ready to purchase the 6th sense CERAMIC IONIC Flat iron to compliment the hair dryer.....I use the hair dryer in the morning after I brush my hair to give it that wind blown free look....just love he results...and appreciate the fact that it is made in France.....I just feel like a lot of thought has gone into this product and the results prove it....
customer_reviews.author: M. Barr

customer_reviews.title: Terrific dryer but packaged like a re-gift!
customer_reviews.text: I sampled this dryer during an continuing education class. I was asked to blow-dry the mannequin heads. I scooped up this light weight dryer....expecting nothing. Fell instantly in love with it. Super light weight, like the button function placement, and the separate ION function button. Don’t let size fool you. Powerful and great control. The power cord is ample. My one complaint.... it’s boxed like something your least favorite relative would re- gift you during the holidays. All in all a great dryer!
customer_reviews.author: William Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great for Black hair
customer_reviews.text: I really like this dryer. I am a black woman with natural hair. I bought this after finding out that ionic dryers are better for our hair. I like this because it’s so light and dries quickly, even on the lowest setting. The hotter setting will make hair straight. It also doesn’t make hair feel brittle afterward
customer_reviews.author: Tanay

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Lovely hair dryer. My hair is long and fine. It is dried quickly. What I like best about this hair dryer is the ionic button. My hair is less frizzy ( gray hair ) and smoother than any other dryer I have ever used. Worth the money and I would purchase again. Almost forgot, it is very lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: Kate D.

customer_reviews.title: I have thin fine hair and this dryer adds volume and shine
customer_reviews.text: i did not have high expectations for this product. I did not understand how an Ionic Hair Dryer would be different than any other kind. Was I ever wrong!! I have thin fine hair and this dryer adds volume and shine! I no longer need to use a hot iron to smooth my hair to make it look styled! Its light weight and easy to use. I can't ever imagine being without it. Well worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: Happy rider

customer_reviews.title: No more flyaways
customer_reviews.text: My hair was always frizzy with flyaways after my old hair dryer. This dryer has made a significant difference in the overall appearance of my hair . The two different settings let me dry it with more volume or sleeker; however, both settings don’t give me flyaways. It’s also very light and small and dries faster than my previous hair dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jmbloom

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific hair dryer.
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the few products that lives up to all the good things people are writing about it in their reviews. It is hands down the best travel hair dryer I have ever owned and I have owned, and discarded, some pretty good ones. If you are considering it, buy it. You will not be disappointed in any way.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great hair dryer
customer_reviews.text: This is a great hair dryer, but I have real thick hair, and in my opinion it didn’t dry my hair any faster. But would for someone else. I really liked the dryer, it is lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but good travel hair dryer!
customer_reviews.text: Impressed with the quality of this hair dryer. I travel weekly for work- and hotel hair dryers were killing my hair. I noticed a nice difference in my hair since using this small but mighty hair dryer when on the road. Only disappointment would be nice if the cord retracted or better cord management- just because every bit of space in your suitcase matters. Very light!
customer_reviews.author: Jenny E.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome experience even  after a year!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wavy hair, but sensitive to shampoos. Some shampoos make my hair frizzy and unmanageable.This hair dryer is really the best. Easy to blow dry your hair and your hair looks amazing with little bit of hair serum.Your hair don't need much work for the rest of the week. It stays great. Now I feel proud of my hair. Its giving the hair volume, good texture and look.You won't regret buying it. I waited a year to write this review,fyi
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hairdryer with many good features
customer_reviews.text: PROS: Very fast drying. Very light weight. Runs quietly, even on high speed. Very long cord. Very pretty dryer CONS: Cord is stiff and hard to manipulate. Cool button will not stay “on” unless operator holds it down. Rather expensive.
customer_reviews.author: L. R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my choice
customer_reviews.text: I decided to purchase this hair dryer based on other reviews and I'm very satisfied with my decision. I'm not a professional stylist but this hair dryer is so light and easy to manage i get great results. No more tired arms and laying the dryer in the sink to change position. Worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Marj2

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair dryer Ever
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for several reasons. Lightweight, short nozzle, adjustable ionic switch, durability. This is a professional model equipped with a professional power cord. You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: PhyllisB

customer_reviews.title: So good and light I bought a 2nd one
customer_reviews.text: For my mom who has issues with her shoulders. The ionic button works well. Heats up well. Small dryer with good power to it. Very happy. Changed in my taiff foxx ion for this.
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: Great handmade hair dryer!! A must have!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love this hair dryer! I have been on a quest for a great hair dryer that does not make my hair frizzy. Prior to buying this product is actually owned 7, yes seven, hair dryers at one time! Including well known high quality brands...Chi, T3, various Conair models all claiming to have the negative ions, or ceramic whatever. Well, I finally found the best one. I don't even need to flat iron my hair after drying with this one. Thank you for a great product. Well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Shoup

product_meta.title: Professional Ionic Hair Dryer for Finest Salons, Handcrafted in France, Frizz-free, Long Lasting Shiny Hair, 1600W Powerful & Quiet Motor, Ultra-Lightweight, Portable, Ergonomic Handle (Blue)
feature_bullets: ⭐SALON QUALITY HIGH PERFORMANCE & FLEXIBILITY: You can experience everyday blow-out by using this professional ionic hair dryer. It dries hair faster to achieve that salon-level day everyday in less than no time .It transforms dry & frizzy hair to a soft, shiny, smooth & sleek finish. It comes with multiple adjustable settings & attachments (concentrator and diffuser nozzles) for different styling needs. Diffusers are great for curly hair to prevent frizz help to define curls & add volume.

⭐EXCELLENT QUALITY & LONG-LIFE AC MOTOR THAT LASTS: Not just your ordinary hair dryer, our hair dryer is entirely handcrafted in France for Europe’s finest salons, hotels and spas. It has a remarkable quality and has a powerful motor that it only uses 1600 low wattage but produces plenty of airflows. It dries as quickly as those with higher wattage. It features legendary reliability and durability. Its long-life motor will outlast your drugstore dryer and you will never look back.

⭐POWERFUL, TIME-SAVING & LIGHTWEIGHT: Our hair dryer is designed with a strong AC motor that reduces your drying time by 70%. Perfect for longer use. Its design includes patented ergonomics that ease the hand, arm and shoulder strain associated with normal hair blower. It weighs in at a mere 12 ounces and features a heavy duty 10-foot cord with circuit breaker. Our hair dryer is compact, portable and ideal for travel. (NOTE: 110-125Volt -US/North America only NOT DUAL VOLTAGE).

⭐IONIC TECHNOLOGY & COOL SHOT BUTTON: Negative ion generator blows billions of negative ions into hair to seal the cuticle while also reducing static & Frizz. It locks in the moisture to protect against heat damage. It helps to create smooth and silky hair. Professional ionic hair dryer comes with a dedicated COOL SHOT BUTTON that helps seal the hair cuticle, setting the final look for long-lasting hold and adds shine.

🇺🇸TOP CUSTOMER SERVICE! We include PAMPERING CUSTOMER SERVICE as well - if anything goes wrong, just email us via your Amazon account and we never quibble. We stand by our 2-YEAR WARRANTY and treat you like we want to be treated. So, treat yourself to an exquisite experience and you’ll never go back to an ordinary dyer. *Register within the 30 days of purchased for the 2-year warranty.
